knowledgeBase.question: Do you offer refunds?
knowledgeBase.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day refund policy.

knowledgeBase.question: What are your business hours?
knowledgeBase.answer: Our business hours are Monday through Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM EST.

knowledgeBase.question: How do I get technical support?
knowledgeBase.answer: Submit a ticket through our support portal or email support@betasolutions.com. Response time is typically within 4 hours.

knowledgeBase.question: Do you offer training sessions?
knowledgeBase.answer: Yes, we offer free onboarding training sessions and advanced training workshops for enterprise customers.

knowledgeBase.question: What is your data retention policy?
knowledgeBase.answer: We retain your data for as long as your account is active. Deleted data is permanently removed after 30 days.

knowledgeBase.question: How do I set up two-factor authentication?
knowledgeBase.answer: Go to Security Settings and enable 2FA. You can use an authenticator app or SMS verification.

knowledgeBase.question: Can I customize the dashboard?
knowledgeBase.answer: Yes, you can customize widgets, rearrange panels, and create custom views based on your preferences.

knowledgeBase.question: What happens if I exceed my usage limits?
knowledgeBase.answer: You'll receive notifications when approaching limits. You can upgrade your plan or purchase additional capacity.

knowledgeBase.question: Do you have a mobile app?
knowledgeBase.answer: Yes, we have iOS and Android apps available in the App Store and Google Play Store.

knowledgeBase.question: How do I generate reports?
knowledgeBase.answer: Navigate to the Reports section, select your desired metrics and date range, then click Generate Report.

knowledgeBase.question: What languages do you support?
knowledgeBase.answer: Our platform is available in English, Spanish, French, German, and Japanese.

knowledgeBase.question: How do I archive old projects?
knowledgeBase.answer: Go to Project Settings and select 'Archive Project'. Archived projects can be restored within 90 days.

knowledgeBase.question: What is your API rate limit?
knowledgeBase.answer: Free plans have 100 requests per hour, Pro plans have 1,000 per hour, and Enterprise plans have custom limits.
